test-stabilization-spec.title: Test Suite Stabilization (Protocol Alignment)
test-stabilization-spec.instruction_raw: Create a MISSION_spec for Jules to resolve 5 integration test failures caused by new absolute protocol enforcements (ITaxableHousehold, IFinancialAgent, ICentralBank). The spec must instruct Jules to update mock agents in the affected test files to implement these protocols. Do not change production code. Affected tests: test_government_integration.py, test_government_refactor_behavior.py, test_omo_system.py, test_settlement_security.py, test_tax_collection.py.
